articles.author: Kat Lonsdorf
articles.title: U.S. Women's Soccer Team Beats New Zealand In A Much-Needed Olympics Comeback - NPR
articles.description: Team USA scored big, rebounding after a disappointing loss to Sweden. The 6-1 win keeps alive the Americans' goal of becoming the first women's team to take Olympic gold after winning the World Cup.
articles.content:
Alex Morgan (#13) celebrates another Team USA goal against New Zealand with teammate Christen Press (#11) at the Tokyo Olympics on Saturday in Saitama, Japan.
Francois Nel/Getty Images

articles.author: Kevin Liptak, CNN
articles.title: Boosters, masks and mandates: Biden's team sorts through options for containing Covid surge among unvaccinated Americans - CNN
articles.description: The Biden administration is debating a series of steps to further contain the Covid-19 pandemic, which, after 18 months, is again surging in parts of the country where vaccination rates are low.
articles.content: (CNN)The Biden administration is debating a series of steps to further contain the Covid-19 pandemic, which, after 18 months, is again surging in parts of the country where vaccination rates are low.… [+10673 chars]

articles.title: Poll shows majority of unvaccinated Americans don't plan on getting full protection: Live COVID-19 updates - USA TODAY
articles.description: A poll shows most unvaccinated Americans don't plan to get a shot. Meanwhile, the U.S. plans to buy 200M more Pfizer doses. Latest COVID-19 updates.
articles.content:
The majority of unvaccinated Americans say they do not plan to get vaccinated against COVID-19, according to a new poll.
